headline: Kroger announces creation of new eCommerce business unit
summary: Kroger (KR) announced the creation of a new eCommerce business unit, which it says “aligns the teams contributing to every aspect of the online customer experience.” Yael Cosset, Kroger’s Senior Vice President and Chief Information Officer, will lead this function as Executive Vice President and Chief Digital Officer, effective immediately, the company stated. “Accelerating Kroger’s eCommerce growth is a top priority. headline: Kroger launches new e-commerce unit and appoints chief digital officer
summary: Yael Cosset, who has previously been instrumental in driving the company's technological overhaul, will now monitor tech and data initiatives
